optimization_callbacks¶

Created on Feb 28, 2012

@author: jhkwakkel

class optimization_callbacks.OptimizationCallback(uncertainties, outcomes, nrOfExperiments, reporting_interval=100, internalPopulation=None, alleleOrder=None)¶

Base class from which different call back classes can be derived. Callback is responisble for storing the results of the runs.
